1251:9: hetoḥ parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ hetvābhāsatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇamantareṇa na śakyate pratipādayitum |
1251:12: yadi nāma darśane darśane nānāprakāraṃ sattvalakṣaṇamuktamāste,
1251:20: yadeva hi pramāṇato nirūpyamāṇaṃ kadārthānāṃ sattvamupapannaṃ bhaviṣyati tadeva vayamapi svīkariṣyāmaḥ |
1251:21: kevalaṃ tadetadarthakriyākāritvaṃ sarvajanaprasiddhamāste tat khalvatra sattvaśabdenābhisandhāya sādhanatvenopāttam |
1251:22: tacca yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣānumānapramāṇaprasiddhasadbhāveṣu bhāveṣu pakṣikṛteṣu pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena pratītamiti na svarūpeṇāśrayadvāreṇa bāsiddhisaṃbhāvanāpi ||
1251:32: saṃbhave vā tenaiva pakṣe'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddheralaṃ sattvānumāneneti cet |
1251:33: ucyate | anumānāntarameva prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyayātmakaṃ ghaṭasya kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhakaṃ pramāṇāntaramasti |
1251:34: tathā hi ghaṭo vartamānakṣaṇe tāvadekāmarthakriyāṃ karoti |
1251:37: na vā kāmapi kriyāmiti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ ||
1251:42: yadā ghaṭo vartamānakṣaṇabhāvi kāryaṃ karoti tadā kimatītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvinyapi kārye śakto'śakto vā |
1251:50: tadaikatra kārye śaktāśaktatvaviruddhadharmādhyāsāt kṣaṇavidhvaṃso ghaṭasya durvāraprasaraḥ syāt |
1251:53: yadā hi śaktasya padārthasya vilambo'pyasahyastadā dūrotsāritamakaraṇam |
1251:55: tasmād yad yadā yajjananavyavahārapātraṃ tattadā tat kuryāt |
1251:57: tadevamekatra kārye samarthetarasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedād ghaṭasya sapakṣatvamakṣatam ||
1251:59: yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tat tadā tajjanayatyeva |
1251:62: asya ca dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇavyavahāragocaratvasya prasaṅgasādhanasya vārtamānikakāryakaraṇakāle sakalakriyātikramakāle ca ghaṭe dharmiṇi parābhyupagamamātrataḥ siddhatvādasiddhistāvadasaṃbhavinī |
1251:66: sākṣādajanake'pi kuśūlādyavasthitavījādau vipakṣe samarthavyavahāragocaratvasya sādhanasya darśanāditi cet |
1251:69: tatra yatpāramārthikaṃ jananaprayuktaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ tadiha sādhanatvenopāttam |
1251:70: tasya ca kuśūlādyavasthitabījādau kāraṇakāraṇatvādaupacārikajananavyavahāraviṣayabhūte saṃbhavābhāvāt kutaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikatā |
1251:73: tathā hīdaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ niyataviṣayatvena vyāptamiti sarvajanānubhavaprasiddham |
1251:78: yadi ca jananamantareṇāpi jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ syāt tadā sarvasya sarvatra jananavyavahāra ityaniyamaḥ syāt |
1251:80: tato jananābhāve vipakṣe niyataviṣayatvasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivartamānaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ janana eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisiddheranavadyo hetuḥ |
1251:81: na caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakāryakaraṇakṣaṇe sakalakriyātikramaṇe cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvi kārya janayati |
1251:85: yad yadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthavyavahārayogyam |
1251:87: na karoti caiṣā ghaṭo vartamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇakāle sakalakriyātikramakāle cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvi kāryamitivyāpakānupalabdhirbhinatti samarthakṣaṇādasamarthakṣaṇam ||
1251:95: yad yadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthamityatra kaḥ karotyarthaḥ |
1251:102: na cātra pakṣe kāraṇatvasāmarthyayoḥ paryāyatvena vyāpakānupalambhasya sādhyāviśiṣṭatvamabhidhātumucitam,
1251:105: tadevaṃ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ siddhaḥ |
1251:106: tat kathaṃ sattvādanyadanumānaṃ dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhakaṃ nāstītyucyate |
1251:111: yo hi pratipattā prativastu yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayati ityādikamupanyasitumanalasastasya tata eva kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ |
1251:112: yastu prativastu tannyāyopanyāsaprayāsabhīruḥ sa khalvekatra dharmiṇi yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayati ityādinyāyena sattvamātramasthairyavyāptamavadhārya sattvādevānyatra kṣaṇikatvamavagacchatīti,
1251:114: tadevamekakāryakāriṇo ghaṭasya dvitīyādikṣaṇa bhāvikāryāpekṣayā samarthetarasvabhāvaviruddhadharmādhyāsād bheda eveti kṣaṇabhaṅgitayā sapakṣatāmāvahati ghaṭe sattvaheturupalabhyamāno na viruddhaḥ |
1251:116: atraiva sādharmyavati dṛṣṭānte sarvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt |
1251:121: tathā hi uktametad vartamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇakāle'tītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikārye'pi ghaṭasya śaktisaṃbhave tadānīmeva tatkaraṇam |
1251:122: akaraṇe ca śaktāśaktasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda iti kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaiva sā arthakriyāśaktiḥ ||
1251:124: vipakṣāt punarekāntena vyāvṛttiriti kuto labhyata iti cet |
1251:129: anvayarūpā ca kartṛdharmaḥ sādhanadharmavati dharmiṇi sādhyadharmasyāvaśyambhāvo yaḥ,
1251:133: tasmād yathā viparyaye bādhakapramāṇabalāt niyamavati vyatireke siddhe'nvayaviṣayaḥ saṃśayaḥ pūrvaṃ sthito'pi paścāt parigalati tato'nvayaprasādhanārthaṃ na pṛthak sādhanamucyate tathā prasaṅgatadviparyayahetudvayabalato niyamavatyanvaye siddhe vyatirekaviṣaye pūrvaṃ sthito'pi sandehaḥ paścāt parigalatyeva |
1251:136: sādhane sati sādhyasyāvaśyamanvayo veti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ |
1251:145: na ca pūrvāparayoḥ kālayorekaḥ pratisandhātā asti,
1251:150: tayā ca hetūphalāvasāyo vikalpa iti cet tadayuktam |
1251:159: tathā hi bījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ bījādijñānāt tatkāryādaṅkurādervā niścetavyam |
1251:166: nanu kāryatvasattvayorbhinnavyāvṛttikatvāt sattāsiddhāvapi kāryatvasiddhau kā kṣatiriti cet |
1251:177: tadasiddhau pūrvasya sāmarthyaṃ na sidhyatīti sandigdhāsiddho hetuḥ ||
1251:179: tathā hi kṣaṇikatve sati na tāvadajātasyānanvayaniruddhasya vā kāryārambhakatvaṃ saṃbhavati|
1251:180: na ca niṣpannasya tāvān kṣaṇo'sti yamupādāya kasmaicit kāryāya vyāpāryeti |
1251:182: atha vā vikalpena yadupanīyate tat sarvamavastu |
1251:184: yadvā sarvasyaiva hetoḥ kṣaṇikatve sādhye viruddhatvaṃ deśakālāntarānanugame sādhyasādhanabhāvābhāvāt |
1251:185: anugame ca nānākālamekamakṣaṇikaṃ kṣaṇikatvena virudhyata iti ||
1251:188: atrocyate | yattāvaduktaṃ sāmarthyaṃ na pratīyata iti,
1251:192: anyathā yenaiva vacanena sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti pratipādyate tasyaiva tatpratipādanasāmarthyamavyāhatamāyātam |
1251:194: tadasvīkāre tu na kaścit kvacit pravarteteti nirīhaṃ jagajjāyeta |
1251:197: sā ca kṣaṇikatve yadi nopapadyate tadā viruddhaṃ vaktumucitam |
1251:200: tathā hi kāraṇagrāhijñānopādeyabhūtena kāryagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asya bhāve asya bhāva ityanvayaniścayo janyate |
1251:201: tathā kāraṇāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhijñānopādeyabhūtena kāryāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asyābhāve asyābhāva iti vyatirekaniścayo janyate |
1251:215: kiṃ tu yatra pramāṇapratītebījādau vastubhūte dharmiṇi pramāṇapratītaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tatra kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhanāya |
1251:224: avastuno vastuno vā svākārasya grāhyatvepi adhyavaseyavastvapekṣayaiva sarvatra prāmāṇyapratipādanād vastusvabhāvasyaiva kṣaṇikatvasya siddhiriti kva virodhaḥ |
1251:225: yacca gṛhyate yaccādhyavasīyate te dve apyanyanivṛttī na vastunī,
1251:244: nānākālasyaikasya vastuno vastuto'saṃbhave'pi sarvadeśakālavartinoratadrūpaparāvṛttayoreva sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratyakṣeṇa vyāptigrahaṇāt |
1251:246: sakalātadrūpaparāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ sākṣādasphuraṇāt pratyakṣasya grāhyo viṣayo mā bhūt,
1251:262: antime tu vikalpadvaye sāmānyādhāratayā dṛṣṭa eva viśeṣaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣyo viśeṣaṇaṃ vā karttavyaḥ |
1251:272: sadṛśakāryakāritvāditi pratyāsattyā ekaviśeṣagrāhakaṃ pratyakṣamatadrūpaparāvṛttamātre niścayaṃ janayadatadrūpaparāvṛttaviśeṣamātrasya vyavasthāpakam |
1251:273: yathaikasāmagrīpratibaddharūpamātragrāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃṃ ghaṭe niścayaṃ janayad ghaṭagrāhakaṃ vyavasthāpyate |
1251:274: anyathā ghaṭo'pi ghaṭasantāno'pi pratyakṣato na sidhyate,
1251:277: yadyevamanenaiva krameṇa sarvasya viśeṣasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvavat vyāptipratipattirapyastu |
1251:278: tat kimarthaṃ nānākālamekamakṣaṇikamabhyupagantavyaṃ yena kṣaṇikatva sādhanasya viruddhatvaṃ syāditi na kaścidvirodha prabhedaprasaṅgaḥ ||
1251:281: nanu yadi prasaṅgaviparyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭedṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ sidhyet tadā sattvasya niyamena kṣaṇikatvena vyāptisiddheranaikāntikatvaṃ nasyāditi yuktam |
1251:283: tathā hi śakto'pi ghaṭaḥ kramikasahakāryapekṣayā kramikāryaṃ kariṣyati |
1251:286: svarūpaṃ ca sarvadāstītyanupakāriṇī sahakāriṇyapekṣā na yujyata iti |
1251:287: satyapi svarūpeṇa kārakatve sāmarthyābhāvāt kathaṃ karotu |
1251:290: na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāṃ tadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ,
1251:295: tathāpi so'pi tāvad bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa kārakaḥ |
1251:296: tasya ca yādṛśaścaramakṣaṇe'kṣepakriyādharmā svabhāvastādṛśa eva cet prathamakṣaṇe tadā tadāpi prasahya kurvāṇo brahmaṇāpyanivāryaḥ |
1251:297: na ca so'pyakṣepakriyādharmā svabhāvaḥ sākalye sati jāto bhāvād bhinna evābhidhātuṃ śakyaḥ,
1251:300: tasmād yadrūpamādāya svarūpeṇāpi janayatītyucyate tasya prāgapi bhāve kathamajaniḥ kadācit |
1251:301: akṣepakriyāpratyanīkasvabhāvasya vā prācyasya paścādanuvṛttau kathaṃ kadācidapi kāryasaṃbhavaḥ ||
1251:302: nanu yadi sa evaikaḥ kartā syād yuktametat |
1251:304: tataḥ sahakāryantaravirahavelāyāṃ balīyaso'pi na kāryaprasava iti kimatra viruddham|
1251:305: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti,
1251:309: atrocyate | yadā militāḥ santaḥ kāryaṃ kurvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu,
1251:311: militaireva tu tat kāryaṃ karttavyamiti kuto labhyate |
1251:317: kiṃ tu pūrvasthitādeva sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭād bhāvāt kāryotpattiranyasmādeva vā viśiṣṭād bhāvādutpannāditi vivādapadam |
1251:318: tatra prāgapi saṃbhave sarvadaiva kāryotpattirna vā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya cakṣuṣī nimīlya tata eva kāryotpattidarśanāditi sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhatīti |
1251:324: vyāptau tu sākṣāt paramparayā kāraṇamātrāpekṣayā kāraṇe vyāpake'yogavyavacchedaḥ |
1251:329: nanu yadi pūrvāparakālayorekasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ sarvadā janakatvenājanakatvena vā vyāpta upalabdhaḥ syāt,
1251:331: na ca kṣaṇabhaṅgavādinā pūrvāparakālayorekaḥ kaścidupalabdha iti cet |
1251:334: parakālabhāvī janako yaḥ svabhāvo bhāvasya sa eva yadi pūrvakālabhāvī,
1251:335: pūrvakālabhāvī vā yo'janakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa eva yadi parakālabhāvī tadopalabdhameva jananamajananaṃ vā syāt |
1251:336: tathā ca sati siddhayoreva svabhāvayorekatvārope siddhameva jananamajananaṃ vāsajyata iti |
1251:339: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijamāgantukaṃ na sahakāryantaram,
1251:340: tato'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvādapi kramavat kāryanānātvopapatteraśakyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratikṣaṇamanyānyatvamupapādayitumiti cet |
1251:344: tat kiṃ prāgapi paścādeva veti vikalpya yaddūṣaṇamudīritaṃ tatra kimuktamaneneti na pratīmaḥ|
1251:345: yattu kāryeṇaiva sahakāriṇo'pekṣyanta ityupaskṛtaṃ tadapi nirupayogam |
1251:346: yadi hi kāryameva svajanmani svatantraṃ syād yuktametat |
1251:349: tathā ca sati santo hetavaḥ sarvathā'samarthāḥ |
1251:351: atha kāryasyaivāyamaparādho yadidaṃ samarthe kāraṇe satyapi kadācinnopapadyata iti cet |
1251:355: svatantraṃ kāryamevaṃ syānna tatkāryaṃ tathā sati ||
1251:360: yadi hi svayaṃ bhavan bhāvayedeva hetuḥ svakāryam,
1251:362: no ced yathā kāraṇe satyapi kārya svātantryānna bhavati,
1251:363: tathā tadabhāve'pi svātantryādeva na bhūtamiti śaṅkā kena nivāryeta |
1251:367: tasmād yathaiva tadabhāve niyamena na bhavati tathaiva tadbhāve niyamena bhavedeva |
1251:372: yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau kāryaṃ kuryāt |
1251:375: atrocyate | sthirasvabhāvatve hi bhāvasyottarakālamevedaṃ kāryaṃ na pūrvakālamiti kuta etat |
1251:380: sthiratve'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva karotīti cet |
1251:382: dhūmādatrāgnirityatrāpi svabhāva evāsya yadidānīmatra niragnirapi dhūma iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt |
1251:387: yadā tu kāraṇasya sthiratve kāryasyottarakālatvamevāsaṅgatamataḥ kāraṇasyāpyuttarakāryajanakatvaṃ vastuto'sambhavi tadā prasaṅgasādhanamidam |
1251:389: uttarakāryajananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ ca tvadabhyupagamāt prathamakāryakaraṇakāla eva ghaṭe dharmiṇi siddham |
1251:390: atastanmātrānubandhina uttarābhimatasta karyasya prathame kṣaṇe'saṃbhavā deva prasaṅgaḥ kriyate |
1251:391: na hi nīlakārake'pi pītakārakatvārope pītasaṃbhavaprasaṅgaḥ svavacanavirodho nāma |
1251:396: tathā hi bījamaṅkurādikaṃkurvad yadi yenaiva svabhāvenāṅkurādikaṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikaṃ tadā kṣityādīnāmapyaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiḥ |
1251:397: nānāsvabhāvatvena tu kārakatve svabhāvānāmanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāritvādekatra bhāvābhavau parasparaviruddhau syātāmityekamapi bījaṃ bhidyeta |
1251:403: tathā bījasyāṅkuraṃ prati kārakatvaṃ gardabhādikaṃ pratyakārakatvamiti kārakatvākārakatve api viruddho dharmau |
1251:405: tadevamekatra bīje pradīpe rūpe ca vipakṣe paridṛśyamānaḥ śaktāśaktatvādirviruddhadharmādhyāso na ghaṭāderbhedaka iti |
1251:409: svabhāvānāṃ hyanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāre bhedaḥ prāptāvasaro na virodhaḥ |
1251:410: virodhastu yadvidhāne yanniṣedho yanniṣedhe ca yadvidhānaṃ tayorekatra dharmiṇi parasparaparihārasthitatayā syāt |
1251:411: tadatraikaḥ svabhāvaḥ svābhāvena viruddho yukto bhāvābhāvavat |
1251:414: pratyakṣavyāpāraścātra yathā nānādharmairadhyāsitaṃ bhāvamabhinnaṃ vyavasthāpayati tathā tatkāryakāriṇaṃ kāryāntarākāriṇaṃ ca |
1251:415: tad yadi pratiyogitvābhāvādanyonyābhāvāvyabhiocāriṇāvapi svabhāvāvaviruddhau tatkārakatvānyākārakatve vāviṣayabhedādaviruddhe tat kimāyātamekakāryaṃ prati śaktāśaktatvayoḥ parasparapratiyoginorviruddhayordharmayīḥ |
1251:418: kevalaṃ yathā tadeva kāryaṃ prati kvaciddeśe śaktirdeśāntare cāśaktiriti deśabhedādaviruddhe śaktyaśaktī tathaikatraiva kāryakālabhedādapyaviruddhe |
1251:419: yathā pūrvaṃ niṣkriyaḥ sphaṭikaḥ sa eva paścāt sakriya iti cet |
1251:421: na hi vayaṃ paribhāṣāmātrādekatra kārye deśabhedādaviruddhe śaktyaśaktī brūmaḥ,
1251:430: sa ca sākṣātparasparapratyanīkatayā bhāvābhāvavad vā bhavet,
1251:431: ekasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanānnityatvasattvavad vā bhavediti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ |
1251:432: tadatraikadharmiṇi tatkālatat kāryakāritvādhāre kālāntare tatkāryākāritvasyānyakāryakāritvasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanādvirodhaḥ |
1251:433: tathā hio yatraiva dharmiṇi tatkālakāryakāritvamupalabdhaṃ na tatraiva kālāntare tatkāryākāritvamanyakāryakāritvaṃ vā brahmaṇāpyupasaṃhartuṃ śakyate,
1251:440: na caivaṃ samānakālakāryāṇāṃ deśabhede'pi dharmibhedo yukto bhedaprasādhakapramāṇābhāvāt |
1251:441: indriyapratyakṣeṇa nirastavibhramāśaṅkenābhedaprasādhanācceti na kālabhede'pi śaktyaśaktyorvirodhaḥ svasamayamātrādapahastayituṃ śakyaḥ,
1251:444: vipratipannaṃ prati tu viruddhadharmādhyāsād bhedavyavahāraḥ sādhyate ||
1251:446: yathā hīdaṃ kramākramanivṛttāvakṣaṇikānnivṛttaṃ tathā sāpekṣatvānapekṣatvayorekatvānekatvayorapi vyāpakayornivṛttau kṣaṇikādapi |
1251:447: tathā hi upasarpaṇapratyayena devadattakarapallavādinā sahacaro bījakṣaṇaḥ pūrvasmādeva puñjāt samartho jāto'napekṣa ādyātiśayasya janaka iṣyate |
1251:448: tatra ca samānakuśūlajanmasu bahuṣu bījasantāneṣu kasmāt kiñcideva bījaṃ paramparayā'ṅkurotpādānuguṇamupajanayati vījakṣaṇaṃ nānye bījakṣaṇā bhinnasantānāntaḥ pātinaḥ |
1251:449: na hi upasarpaṇapratyayāt prāgeva teṣāṃ samānāsamānasantānavartināṃ bījakṣaṇānāṃ kaścit paramparātiśayaḥ |
1251:453: hanta tarhi tadabhāve satyutpanno'pi na janayedeva |
1251:454: tathā ca kevalānāṃ vyabhicārasaṃbhavādādyātiśayotpādakamaṅkuraṃ vā pratikṣityādīnāṃ parasparāpekṣāṇāmevotpādakatvamakāmenāpi svīkarttavyam |
1251:458: api cāntyo bījakṣaṇo'napekṣāṅkurādikaṃ kurvan yadi yenaiva rūpeṇāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikaṃ tadā kṣityādīnāmapyaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattirabhinnakāraṇatvāditi na tāvadekatvasaṃbhavaḥ ||
1251:462: yadyevaṃ sahakāritvopādānatve kimekaṃ tattvaṃ nānā vā |
1251:466: abhede vā kathaṃ bījasya na nānātvaṃ bhinnatādātmyāt,
1251:468: yadyucyeta kṣityādau janayitavye tadupādānaṃ pūrvameva kṣityādibījasya rūpāntaramiti |
1251:469: na tarhi bījaṃ tadanapekṣaṃ kṣityādīnāṃ janakam |
1251:475: yadi manyetānupakārakā api bhavanti sahakāriṇo'pekṣaṇīyāśca kāryeṇānuvihitabhāvābhāvācca sahakaraṇācca |
1251:477: kariṣyate ca kramavatsahakārivaśaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇīti vyāpakānupalabdherasiddheḥ sandigdhavyatirekamanaikāntikaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatva siddhāviti |
1251:481: atha pūrvāvasthitasyaiva bījādeḥ sahakāriṇā saha saṃbhūyakaraṇam |
1251:489: tatastādṛksvabhāvasaṃbhave'yakaraṇaṃ sahakāriṇi nirapekṣatāṃ na kṣamata iti cet |
1251:492: sa cādyātiśayajanakatvalakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣo na samānāsamānasantānavartiṣu bījakṣaṇeṣu sarveṣveva saṃbhavī |
1251:494: nanvekatra kṣetre niṣpattilavanādipūrvakamānīyaikatra kuśūle kṣiptāni sarvāṇyeva bījāni sādhāraṇarūpāṇyeva pratīyante |
1251:497: kāraṇaṃ khalu sarvatra kārye dvividham- dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ ceti sarvāstikaprasiddhametat |
1251:499: tato bhavedapi kāraṇasāmagrīśaktibhedāttādṛśaḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ keṣāñcideva bījakṣaṇānāṃ yena ta eva bījakṣaṇā ādyātiśayamaṅkuraṃ vā paramparayā janayeyuḥ |
1251:501: nanu yeṣūpasarpaṇapratyayasahacareṣu svakāraṇaśaktibhedādādyātiśayajanakatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣaḥ saṃbhāvyate sa tatrāvaśyamastīti kuto labhyamiti cet |
1251:508: bhedo veti matadvaye mitibalaṃ yasyāstvasau jitvaraḥ |
1251:510: sāmagrī tu na sarvathekṣaṇasahā kāryaṃ tu mānānugam || iti ||
1251:511: tadevaṃ nopakāro'pekṣārtha ityanapekṣaiva kṣaṇikasya sahakāriṣu nobhayavyāvṛtiḥ ||
1251:513: tadā yadi pūrvasthitasyeti viśeṣaṇāpekṣā tadā kṣaṇikasya naivaṃ kadācidityanapekṣaivākṣīṇā |
1251:514: atha pūrvasthitasyetyanapekṣya militāvasthitasyaiva karaṇamapekṣārthastadā sāpekṣataiva, nānapekṣā |
1251:518: yacca bījasyaikenaiva svabhāvena kārakatve kṣityādīnāmaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiranyathā kāraṇābhede'pi kāryabhede'pi kāryasyāhetukatvaprasaṅgādityuktam tadasaṅgatam |
1251:522: yacca kāraṇābhede kāryābheda ityuktaṃ tatra sāmagrīsvarūpaṃ kāraṇamabhipretam |
1251:524: na punaḥ sāmagrīmadhyagatenaikenānekaṃ kāryaṃ na kartavyaṃ nāma,
1251:527: na cendriyapratyakṣaṃ bhinnadeśaṃ sapratighaṃ dṛśyamarthadvayamekamevopalambhayatīti kvacidupalabdham yena tatrāpi bhede śaṅkā syāt |
1251:532: tadetau dvāvapi vyāpakānupalambhāvasiddhau na kṣaṇikāt sattvaṃ nivartayata iti nāyamasādhāraṇo hetuḥ ||
1251:533: api ca vidyamāno bhāvaḥ sādhyetarayoraniścitānvayavyatireko gandhavattādivadasādhāraṇo yuktaḥ |
1251:536: tadevaṃ śaktasya kṣepāyogāt samarthavyavahāragocaratvaṃ jananena vyāptamiti prasaṅgaviparyayayoḥ satve hetorapi nānaikāntikatvam |
